Name: Adam Cherti
AboutMe:
I'm a passionate computer scientist doing this since my birthday and i'm currently working as a web developer at Gameloft. I also like to follow the trends of website creating and occasionally create shiny websites with other designers/photographers for businesses and restaurants that want their visibility to grow.

While the Cloud has emerged, i'd like to explore this field and work on it on the future eventually.

In my free time, i try to play some music : saxophone, and to watch some theatre with lovely people.

While doing all of this, my brain is storming and always thinking about new ideas of business, philosophy and life.
